snippet: The conversation involving Mr. Silver, at the time the New York Assembly speaker, touched on the fees he got from Glenwood Management’s limited liability companies.
abstract: Lobbyist Brian Meara testifies in corruption trial of former New York Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver about strange call he received from Silver in 2011, during which speaker wanted to talk about financial disclosure records and whether Meara represented limited liability companies owned by Glenwood Management.
lead_paragraph: The conversation involving Mr. Silver, at the time the New York Assembly speaker, touched on the fees he got from Glenwood Management’s limited liability companies.

headline.main: Lobbyist Testifies of Unusual Phone Call From Sheldon Silver
headline.print_headline: Lobbyist Testifies About an Odd Call From Silver on Financial Disclosure
